timeline.bodyText:
agreed, or you can also consider this approach:
https://github.com/kiegroup/kogito-runtimes/pull/762/files#diff-59003bc182a20b006a260bae9299342aR164
what do you think?
That way, it should not detect enumeration somewhere else in the source code (for instance a field name) since the .* should not match line breaking character IIRC ?
timeline.author: tarilabs

replies.bodyText: Thank you! I'll follow your approach.
replies.author: tkobayas

timeline.message:
[KOGITO-3078] DMN strongly typed: output definition
- Use InputSet first
- Fixed assertion
